score: 0 out of 1 people found the following review useful
review: As much as I liked Seven I have to admit Fight Club was better theres something about this movie that I really liked cant really say what it is but I can say its weird fun for everybody Brad Pitt and Edward Norton make a funny combination you cant miss this movie David Fincher really knows how to direct great movies.
